name: Balloonacy
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN 

Welcome to Balloonacy.

Controls in game, but to be sure:

A and D to move left and right.

Balloons lift you up, the more you have, the more lift you get.

Right Mouse Button to inflate a balloon. 

Click a balloon to pop it. 

Press R to restart at any time.

The scoring system is as follows:

Time over 5:30 = F.

Time over 4:30 = E.

Time over 3:30 = D.

Time over 2:50 = C.

Time over 2:00 = B.

Time over 1:30 = A.

Time UNDER 1:30 = A+ (Game Completion).

N.B. The developer has only achieved an A. If anyone gets an A+, please leave a screenshot in the comments!

Credits:

Game design and programming:

Mike Bailey

All assets free to use under creative commons license: https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/
